lead_paragraph: Comcast-Spectacor is getting into the ticket-selling business at its major sports and entertainment sites under an enterprise called ComcastTix. It announced yesterday that it would replace Ticketmaster and other companies that had provided the service. ComcastTix will serve all events at the Wachovia Center, the home of the Philadelphia Flyers and the Philadelphia 76ers, and the neighboring Wachovia Spectrum in South Philadelphia.
